RelatedSentence: Philippines mobile operators Smart Communications , Globe Telecom and Sun Cellular plan to file a protest with the Court of Appeals against the National Telecommunications Commission 's ( NTC ) order to refund subscribers some PHP 7 billion for overcharging them 20 cents for off - net text messages , the Manila Times reports .
The operators have until 25 May to file the claim .
Last week , the NTC ordered the three mobile operators to reimburse their subscribers 20 cents for off - net text messages sent to other networks .

RelatedSentence: This happened after the NTC declined the motion for reconsideration filed by the telecommunication companies in December 2012 .
This happened after the NTC declined the motion for reconsideration filed by the telecommunication companies in December 2012 .
The operators had challenged an October 2011 directive to reduce interconnection charges for SMS .
